mapper.select: select healthcare_contents.CT_NAME AS title, concat('http://210.127.55.205/contents/eng_filename/', healthcare_contents.CT_URL_ENG) AS videoUrl, concat('http://210.127.55.205/contents/eng_filename/thumbnail/', healthcare_contents.CT_URL_THUM_ENG) AS thumbnailUrl, healthcare_contents.ct_duration AS duration from ms_grade_data, contents_category, healthcare_contents where ms_grade_data.Ms_Grade_ID = #{masterGradeId} and ms_grade_data.Ms_Grade_ID = contents_category.MS_Grade_ID and contents_category.CT_ID = healthcare_contents.CT_ID;

select healthcare_contents.CT_NAME AS title, concat('http://210.127.55.205/contents/eng_filename/', healthcare_contents.CT_URL_ENG) AS videoUrl, concat('http://210.127.55.205/contents/eng_filename/thumbnail/', healthcare_contents.CT_URL_THUM_ENG) AS thumbnailUrl, healthcare_contents.ct_duration AS duration from healthcare_contents where healthcare_contents.ct_info = #{infoType};

select healthcare_contents.CT_NAME AS title, concat(IF(STRCMP(A.address,'경기도 광명시'), 'http://210.127.55.205/contents2/eng_filename/', 'http://210.127.55.205/contents/eng_filename/'), healthcare_contents.CT_URL_ENG) AS videoUrl, concat('http://210.127.55.205/contents/eng_filename/thumbnail/', healthcare_contents.CT_URL_THUM_ENG) AS thumbnailUrl, healthcare_contents.ct_duration AS duration from ms_grade_data, contents_category, healthcare_contents, ( SELECT SCHOOL_INFO.address AS address FROM healthcare_gwangmyeong.SCHOOL_REGISTER, healthcare_gwangmyeong.SCHOOL_INFO WHERE SCHOOL_REGISTER.Student_ID = #{user_id} AND SCHOOL_REGISTER.School_ID = SCHOOL_INFO.School_ID ORDER BY SCHOOL_REGISTER.School_Year DESC LIMIT 1 ) A where ms_grade_data.Ms_Grade_ID = #{masterGradeId} and ms_grade_data.Ms_Grade_ID = contents_category.MS_Grade_ID and contents_category.CT_ID = healthcare_contents.CT_ID;
